name: Arise Mexzmiriah
description:
A Third Person Arcade Shooter

Latest Version: 0.7.8.3

Controls

  • Movement - W, A, S, D
  • L Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • RMouse - Aim
  • LMouse - Shoot
  • MMouse - Shoot Teleport
  • Enter - Start
  • ESC - Quit

Features Mexzmiriah and Nyctoiia as playable characters
